package.name: gcc_pass2
package.unpack:
tar xf ${SRCDIR}/gcc-${PKGVERSION}.tar.xz tar xf ${SRCDIR}/mpfr-4.1.0.tar.xz tar xf ${SRCDIR}/gmp-6.2.1.tar.lz tar zxf ${SRCDIR}/mpc-1.2.1.tar.gz
mv -v mpc-1.2.1 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/mpc mv -v gmp-6.2.1 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/gmp mv -v mpfr-4.1.0 gcc-${PKGVERSION}/mpfr mkdir -v gcc-${PKGVERSION}/gcc-build
package.patch:
cd gcc-${PKGVERSION}
case $(uname -m) in x86_64) sed -e '/m64=/s/lib64/lib/' -i.orig gcc/config/i386/t-linux64 ;; esac cd gcc-build mkdir -pv $LFS_TGT/libgcc ln -s ../../../libgcc/gthr-posix.h $LFS_TGT/libgcc/gthr-default.h
package.build:
cd gcc-${PKGVERSION}/gcc-build
#ARMFLOAT='' #ARMFPU='' JOBS=4
# Settings for Raspberry Pi #case ${LFS_TGT} in # *armv6l*) # ARMFLOAT="--with-float=hard" # ARMFPU="--with-fpu=vfp" # JOBS=1 # ;; #esac
../configure \ --build=$(../config.guess) \ --host=$LFS_TGT \ --prefix=/usr \ CC_FOR_TARGET=$LFS_TGT-gcc \ --with-build-sysroot=$CHROOTDIR \ --enable-initfini-array \ --disable-nls \ --disable-multilib \ --disable-decimal-float \ --disable-libatomic \ --disable-libgomp \ --disable-libquadmath \ --disable-libssp \ --disable-libvtv \ --disable-libstdcxx \ --enable-languages=c,c++
# Fix build on RaspberryPi #case $LFS_TGT in # armv6l*) # sed -i 's/none-/armv6l-/' Makefile # ;; #esac make -j $JOBS
package.install: cd gcc-${PKGVERSION}/gcc-build make DESTDIR=$CHROOTDIR install ln -sv gcc $CHROOTDIR/usr/bin/cc # ln -sv /tools/lib/libgcc_s.so{,.1} ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/lib # ln -sv /tools/lib/libstdc++.so{,.6} ${CHROOTDIR}/usr/lib # echo 'main(){}' > dummy.c # cc dummy.c # readelf -l a.out | grep ': /tools' # true
